freq-beat
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

- Create short, random MIDI segments, focused on drums.
- Paste segments together for larger songs.
- More extreme, glitchy MIDI outputs.

## Install

``` sh
pip install freq_beat
```
